item.title: 零钱兑换
item.author: vllbc
item.description: 零钱兑换 https://leetcode-cn.com/problems/coin-change/ 以我目前的水平做出来有点吃力，看了思路才做出来 class Solution: def coinChange(self, coins: List[int], amount: int) -> int: dp = [float('inf')] * (amount + 1) dp[0] = 0 for i in range(amount+1): for coin in coins: # if i >= coin: dp[i] = min(dp[i],dp[i-coin]+1) return -1 if (dp[-1] == float("inf"))
